A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 25, 2010''', at 21:54 UTC.<ref>[[wordofnotch:353150540|Tile particle emittors, better explosions, and ads]] – The Word of Notch, January 25, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Particles (Java Edition)|Particles]]'''
* Added a particle {{code|flame}}.<ref group="note" name="gameplay" />
* Added a particle {{code|lava}}.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks===
'''[[File:Lava JE6.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Lava exposed to air becomes stone, similar to how water exposed to air would evaporate.<ref name="Forum7">{{link|url=https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796525-new-features-in-indev|title=~Lava hardens to stone over time even without water. It tends to happen around the edges.|author=mrfatcat|website=Minecraft Forum|date=January 25, 2010}}</ref>
* Now emits particles {{code|lava}}.

'''[[File:Torch JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Torch]]'''
* Now emits particles {{code|flame}}.

'''[[File:TNT JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[TNT]]'''
* No longer damages entities or destroys dropped items.<ref group="note" name="gameplay" />
* Fuse is now 4 seconds (raised from 2).<ref group="note" name="gameplay" />
* Now flashes when lit.

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Starting House JE1.png|40px]] [[Starting house]]'''
* Added one more chest, containing a stack of each color of cloth.<ref group="note" name="gameplay">This has been verified by gameplay from this version's jar dated January 25, 2010 at 21:01 UTC.</ref>
** Cloth is no longer found in the main blocks chest.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Damage]]'''
* Drowning damage has now been reduced from 1 heart per half-second to 1 heart per second.
* Drowning now creates particles around drowning entities.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed the bug causing item switching to make a block unbreakable and cycle through all block textures on it.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* Making sand or gravel fall onto the player's head creates a temporary X-Ray effect.
